title: Chelsea news: Diego Costa plans Chelsea exit if club do not offer contract | Metro News
text:
Manchester United plan new move for 'un-sellable' Real Madrid star 

Last month, Costa revealed that he was on the verge of returning to Atletico Madrid before the start of the season. 
‘Yes, yes. I was about to leave. I was about to… but I’m happy here as well and that’s that,’ said the Spain international. 
‘I had the possibility to go to Atletico, because of a few things, the family, the life I have there but not because of Chelsea. Here, there’s a lot of love with the supporters, with the people, so I’m here very happy. I’m very content. 
‘There was one thing I wanted to change for family reasons but, well, it wasn’t to be and I continue happy here. It was important too that the manager, from the very first minute, said he counted on me.’
